title: How do you private message, is it possible

replies.body:
In game use /msg [name]

For outside of games, use Skype.
replies.body_tagged:
In game use /msg [name]

For outside of games, use Skype.

replies.body: I wanted to know if it was possible to private message on these forums
replies.body_tagged: I wanted to know if it was possible to private message on these forums

replies.body: No, it's not. You could add them on skype (it should be on their profile)
replies.body_tagged: No, it's not. You could add them on skype (it should be on their profile)

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there isn't a way to private message someone on the forums.

Sorry about that!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: No it isnt. Just use skype :)
replies.body_tagged: No it isnt. Just use skype :)

reply_to.body: I wanted to know if it was possible to private message on these forums
reply_to.body_tagged: I wanted to know if it was possible to private message on these forums

replies.body:
Seeing as your question was answered, I'm going to lock this topic to prevent any further spam.

Anywho.. if you wish to contact a certain member of the community, you can click on their profile and see if they have added their Skype account under the "Social Networks" subcategory.

If the player has not shared their Skype, your best luck would be trying to find them in-game, or on TeamSpeak 3 (ts.avicus.net).
